name: MIERS/JOHNSTON PRINTING CORPORATION, Appellant, v. BUCKS COUNTY BANK AND TRUST COMPANY, Appellee
name_abbreviation: Miers/Johnston Printing Corp. v. Bucks County Bank & Trust Co.
docket_number: Appeal No. 145 Middle District Appeal Docket 1997

parties: MIERS/JOHNSTON PRINTING CORPORATION, Appellant, v. BUCKS COUNTY BANK AND TRUST COMPANY, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 22nd day of April, 1998, the Order of the Court of Common Pleas of Lehigh County granting the motion to enter judgment of non pros is vacated and the case is remanded to that court for reconsideration in light of Marino v. Hackman, — Pa. -, 710 A.2d 1108 (1998) and Jacobs v. Halloran, — Pa. -, 710 A.2d 1098 (1998). Jurisdiction relinquished.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
707 A.2d 1144
MIERS/JOHNSTON PRINTING CORPORATION, Appellant, v. BUCKS COUNTY BANK AND TRUST COMPANY, Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
April 22, 1998.
